english.segment1: It only took a moment. To turn my life around. The sky was cracked wide open. It tore these four walls down
english.segment2: It was the light of the sun
english.segment3: The beauty that surrounded me. Was like nothing I had seen. The sky was filled with colors. And all creation sings
english.segment4: I never wanted anymore. Than I could fit inside my hands, inside my hands. It was the light of the sun.
